title: Disco Djinn Dilemma
tagline: Shake your genie pants, it's time for an enchanting quest!
mpaa_rating_content: This film is rated G for mild thematic elements, some comic mischief, and a magical atmosphere suitable for all audiences.
critic_review: With a delightful blend of humor and heart, 'Disco Djinn Dilemma' spins a family-friendly yarn that captures the spirit of the disco era without missing a beat. Perch Douglas shines as Farid, bringing a touch of nostalgia to the dance floor, while director Edgar Wrenwright crafts a whimsical mansion full of mystery. A feel-good film that gets you tapping your feet, perfect for the young and the young at heart.
description: Join our charming sidekick, Farid Flash, and the alluring femme fatale, Layla Luminous, as they boogie through the bewitched halls of the Shimmering Shindig Mansion. Under the disco ball, they dance their way through riddles and funky curses in a groovy quest for the ultimate power - the mythical Disco Lamp. With Perch Douglas leading the cast as the sly but lovable Farid and Edgar Wrenwright's visionary direction, this Oscar-worthy biopic will have you believing in the power of disco and the magic of friendship!
object_prompt: Create a simple and Humorous title, short and simple Playful tagline, and description teaser of a MPAA G rated movie. The movie stars Perch Douglas and is Directed by Edgar Wrenwright. Located at Mansion (Mysterious/Haunted) of a Biography Oscar Bait film where Sidekick and Femme Fatale are the main characters. The movie is about a Quest for Power during Disco Era. make the character names of Middle Eastern origin. Provide what the movie contains which is the reason for the rating. The title, tagline and description should be consistent with the rating of the movie. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
image_prompt: Illustrate a whimsical, vibrant disco-themed ballroom within the enchanted Shimmering Shindig Mansion. The scene is filled with dazzling lights and sparkling reflections from the central, oversized disco ball. Farid Flash, a charming character with a sly grin, is dressed in colorful, retro genie attire and Layla Luminous, a radiant character with an aura of mystery, is wearing a shimmering dress that catches the light. They are both dancing joyfully among magical artifacts and floating musical notes, with the mythical Disco Lamp glowing enticingly in the background. The atmosphere is fun, lively, and filled with the essence of disco magic and camaraderie.
